section.title: Third Party Integrations
section.para: We have the following documentation showing how to integrate [[[kw-hos-phrase]]] with third party solutions.

listitem.para: [[[kw-hos-phrase]]] supports the integration of 3rd-party components with a [[[kw-hos]]] platform deployment, whether that is a completely separate service or a plugin/driver to an existing service in the [[[kw-hos]]] stack. The 3rd-party mechanism supports the integration of a range of different types of content.
This documentation demonstrates the possible integration between the [[[kw-hos-phrase]]] centralized logging solution and Splunk including the steps to setup and forward logs.
